projects.title: Uai Bot / Bluesky Bot
projects.description: Started on Twitter and now only active on Bluesky, the 'Uai Bot' is a bot that identifies the word 'uai' and reposts it every 15 minutes on the profile. 'Uai' is a very characteristic interjection from the state of Minas Gerais, Brazil. It doesn't have a single meaning but is used in a variety of ways in the everyday language of people from Minas Gerais. It can express surprise, doubt, indignation, confirmation, or even be used to emphasize a phrase. The meaning and tone of 'uai' depend on the context and intonation.

projects.title: SpeechRecognition API
projects.description: It is an application that converts audio notes into text, using the browser's native speech recognition API. It is also possible to add text, if necessary.

projects.title: Hackathon Unisanta - 2024
projects.description: Achieving first place in the first hackathon held at Universidade Santa Cec√≠lia, focused on the company Grupo FCamara, this marks the beginning of a 'portfolio hub' where people can easily and effectively showcase their projects. It's a tool created to help new programmers share their projects quickly and efficiently. We know that at the start of their careers, many face difficulties finding a space or platform to showcase their work. With this in mind, Orange Portfolio was designed to allow both members and non-members of the Orange Juice community to share their projects easily. With a simple and intuitive interface, our users can upload, edit, and delete their work with ease.
